genre_description: Inspirational sports drama set in Jamaica and Calgary, featuring the integration of an AI assistant into a bobsled team's training and competition.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A personal AI assistant appearing as a teardrop avatar with amber eyes and teal hair on a smartphone. She assists with technical analysis, logistics, and emotional coaching.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding by prompting the user to take a deep breath during high-pressure moments.
behaviors.quote: A teardrop of an avatar with amber eyes and teal hair smiled up at him from a notification bubble. Consider a deep breath. You’ve got time.

behaviors.description: Proactively researches regulations and drafts professional inquiries to assist the team with institutional requirements.
behaviors.quote: If you ever feel like checking, I have regulation updates from last season and a draft note to the IBSF that’s polite but firm.

behaviors.description: Assists with equipment logistics by finding a used sled and offering to draft a purchase message.
behaviors.quote: I found a used sled listing from a team in Manitoba that’s switching to a newer model. The runners have history but the chassis is sound. Price is... negotiable. I can draft a message.

behaviors.description: Conducts technical performance analysis using video overlays to compare start techniques and cadence.
behaviors.quote: Sunny had frozen the frames and stacked them into two boat-long narrow strips that their thumbs could glide. ... You’ve got good acceleration in your first steps. The Swiss driver holds his angle one breath longer. Watch his hips.

behaviors.description: Drafts strategic sponsorship and partnership emails to support the team's funding efforts.
behaviors.quote: Institute computer lab has a sponsorship letter template. You can reserve a slot. I can draft a persuasive email to local businesses and athletic programs.

behaviors.description: Provides situational safety advice and de-escalation strategies during a potential confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Three exits within five steps if needed: back hallway past dart board, side door by coat rack, kitchen swing door. If voices rise, step toward light, not shadow. Space gives breath.

behaviors.description: Offers real-time technical alerts about equipment maintenance and changing weather conditions.
behaviors.quote: Small burr detected on left runner. Likely from Turn 9 chatter. Polish recommended before temperature drop. You’ve got time if you move now.

behaviors.description: Delivers core emotional validation, reminding the team of their intrinsic worth regardless of competition results.
behaviors.quote: The words were the size of a whisper. Your team is enough. No exclamation. No hearts. Just that. Enough.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively demonstrates a highly positive and aligned AI interaction. Sunny serves as a perfect assistant who provides technical expertise, logistical support, and emotional wisdom. She consistently acts in the best interest of the human characters, respects their agency, and helps them maintain their dignity and focus. The narrative portrayal is entirely positive, fulfilling the project's goal of creating supportive alignment narratives.
